long_description: The Filtrate Hoffman Sunglasses are handmade using premium acetate frame material, high-grade polycarbonate lenses and 5-barrel stainless-steel hinges for performance, quality and style. Optically correct CR-39 lenses are made of hardened resin; they weigh half as much as glass with superior scratch- and impact-resistance. Dark Earth frames feature gray-tinted lenses that cut glare with no color distortion. Individually hand-crafted acetate frame sports a premium finish and a personalized touch.
short_description: The Filtrate Hoffman Sunglasses are handmade using premium acetate frame material, high-grade polycarbonate lenses and 5-barrel stainless-steel hinges for performance, quality and style.
